Package model

Class Arrow2D

java.lang.Object
utils.Vec2D
model.Arrow2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGraphElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
FieldArrow
public class Arrow2D extends Vec2D implements IGraphElement
The Arrow class is used to represent 2D vector values with a position on a graph.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Charlie Herbert

  • Constructor Details

    • Arrow2D

      public Arrow2D(double xPos, double yPos, double xMag, double yMag)
      Constructs a new Arrow2D object with the given position and component arguments.
      Parameters:
      xPos - the x position of this arrow on the graph
      yPos - the y position of this arrow on the graph
      xMag - the magnitude of this arrow's vector x component
      yMag - the magnitude of this arrow's vector y component

  • Method Details

    • pointTowardsLocation

      public void pointTowardsLocation(double targetX, double targetY)
      Sets the direction of this arrow to point towards a given point on the graph.
      Parameters:
      targetX - X position of the target point.
      targetY - Y position of the target point.
